context_of_use: This use case allows power users to execute and manage bulk operations within the system to enhance their efficiency.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: increase efficiency in operations
description: Allows power users to execute and manage bulk operations for increased efficiency.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a request to handle bulk operations.
preconditions: Power user is logged into the system.
Power user has the necessary permissions to handle bulk operations.
postconditions: Power user receives confirmation of completed operations.
assumptions: The system has the capability to handle bulk operations.
Power user is familiar with the bulk operations process.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to handle bulk operations.
The system shall provide feedback upon completion of bulk operations.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations supported by the system.
main_flow: 1. Power user initiates a request to handle bulk operations → System processes the request.
2. System displays available bulk operation options → Power user selects the desired operation.
3. Power user confirms the operation details → System executes the bulk operation.
4. System provides confirmation of completed operations → Power user reviews the results.
